Parallels.ab: aētat̰ dim vīspanąm mazištəm dazdiiāi ahūmca ratūmca yim ahurəm mazdąm ~ VrS27.48 āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi iδa dim vīspanąm mazištəm dadəmahi ahūmca ratūmca yim ahurəm mazdąm; ~ Y19.12 yat̰ dim ahūmca ratūmca ādadat̰ iϑa dim para.cinasti yim ahurəm mazdąm manas.paōiriiaēibiiō dāmabiiō yaϑa īm vīspanąm mazištəm cinasti.

Nerangs.ab: aētat̰ dim vīspanąm abarhāwan bē abrāzēnišn mazištəm dazdiiāi ahūmca ratūmca yim ahurəm mazdąm abarhāwan pad urwēs bē nihišn snaϑāi aŋrahe mainiiə̄uš druuatō. ...

"At aētat̰.dim vīspanąm, he has to raise the abarhāwan (and they continue with) mazištəm dazdiiāi ahūmca ratūmca yim ahurəm mazdąm He has to hit the urwēs with the abarhāwan (and the continue with) snaϑāi aŋrahe mainiiə̄uš druuatō..."
